--- title: "Summer 2024 Goals Timeline" author: "Sarah Tanja" date: '09/08/2024' categories: [goals] draft: false toc: true toc-exand: true toc-title: Contents toc-depth: 5 toc-location: left reference-location: margin citation-location: margin link-external-icon: true link-external-newwindow: true --- ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} knitr::opts_chunk$set( warning = FALSE, message = FALSE ) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} # Install packages if ("tidyverse" %in% rownames(installed.packages()) == 'FALSE') install.packages('tidyverse') if ("dplyr" %in% rownames(installed.packages()) == 'FALSE') install.packages('dplyr') if ("plotly" %in% rownames(installed.packages()) == 'FALSE') install.packages('plotly') library(plotly) library(dplyr) library(tidyverse) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} events <- data.frame( date = as.Date(c("2023-01-01", "2023-03-15", "2023-05-20", "2023-08-10")), event = c("Event A", "Event B", "Event C", "Event D") ) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} # Ensure the dates are in the correct order events <- events %>% arrange(date) # Create the plot timeline_plot <- plot_ly( events, x = ~event, y = ~date, type = 'scatter', mode = 'lines+markers', text = ~event, hoverinfo = 'text', marker = list(size = 10), line = list(color = 'blue', width = 2) ) %>% layout( title = "Interactive Timeline", yaxis = list(title = "Date", type = "date"), xaxis = list(title = "Event"), margin = list(l = 100, r = 100, t = 100, b = 100), hovermode = "closest" ) # Make the y-axis scrollable timeline_plot <- timeline_plot %>% layout( yaxis = list( title = "Date", rangeslider = list(visible = TRUE), autorange = "reversed" # To reverse the order of dates on y-axis ) ) timeline_plot ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: :::
